script:module:
Option Explicit
dim LoyaltySheet, LoyaltyForm as object
'old values const _LoyaltyStartCol = 1 const _LoyaltySleeperCol = 3 const _LoyaltySleeperDataCol = 6
global const _LoyaltyRow = 2 const _LoyaltyRefRow = 231 const _GoalsRefOffset = 1 const _FinalFiveRefOffset = 1 const _FlawRefRow = 262
const _NumFlaws = 9
const _NumMotives = 14 const _NumMotivesDealt = 4
const _LoyaltyGameRefCol = 0 const _LoyaltyTextRefCol = 1
' new values global const _LoyaltyAgendaRow = 2 const _LoyaltyFlawRow = _LoyaltyAgendaRow const _LoyaltyStartRow = _LoyaltyAgendaRow + 1 const _LoyaltySleeperRow = _LoyaltyAgendaRow + 3 const _LoyaltyOtherRow = _LoyaltyAgendaRow + 5 global const _MaxLoyaltyInHand = 10
const _LoyaltyCol = 0
const _MutineerCol = 4 const _MutineerRow = 17
const _LoyaltyDeckCol = 1 const _LoyaltyDeckRow = 17
const _LoyaltyCntRow = 13
const _LoyaltyNotCylonCol = _LoyaltyDeckCol + 1 const _LoyaltyNotCylonRow = _LoyaltyDeckRow
const _LoyaltyStart = 0 const _LoyaltySleeper = 1 const _LoyaltyOther = 2 const _LoyaltyAgenda = 3 global const _LoyaltyFlaw = 4
global const _DeckLoyalty = 0 global const _DeckNotACylon = 1 global const _DeckFlaws = 2
sub GetLoyalty if LoyaltySheet <> NULL then exit sub end if
LoyaltySheet= ThisComponent.Sheets.getByName("Loyalty") LoyaltyForm = LoyaltySheet.DrawPage.Forms.GetByName("formLoyalty") Randomize end sub
function PlayerLoyaltyCol (playerID as integer) as integer PlayerLoyaltyCol = _LoyaltyCol + playerID end function
function LoyaltyCardColor (cardtxt as string) as variant if InStr(cardtxt, "Not") > 0 then LoyaltyCardColor = _black elseif InStr(cardtxt, "Sympath") > 0 then LoyaltyCardColor = _blue elseif InStr(cardtxt,"Personal") > 0 or InStr(cardtxt,"Final Five") > 0 then LoyaltyCardColor = _green1 elseif InStr(cardtxt, "Mutineer") > 0 then LoyaltyCardColor = _brown elseif InStr(cardtxt, "Human") > 0 then ' Human Allegiance Motive LoyaltyCardColor = _blue3 elseif InStr(cardtxt, "Allegiance") > 0 then ' Cylon Allegiance Motive LoyaltyCardColor = _red2 elseif InStr(cardtxt,"Cylon") > 0 then LoyaltyCardColor = _red else 'leader LoyaltyCardColor = _purple end if
end function
'+== The source for agendas should be moved into reference tables function Deal_Agenda () as string dim agendacards as variant dim leadercard as integer
if (PlayerCnt() = 4) or (PlayerCnt() = 6) then ' Sympathetic Agendas agendacards = Array ("Salvage their Equipment","The Illusion of Hope","Prove Their Worth","Convert the Infidels",_ "Join the Colonials","Guide Them to Destiny") else ' Hostile Agendas agendacards = Array ("Mutual Annihilation","Genocide","Grant Mercy","Show Their True Nature","Reduce Them to Ruins",_ "Siege Warfare") end if
leadercard = Int(RND() * 6)
Deal_Agenda = agendacards(leadercard) end function
function GetCylonCards (playerID as integer) as variant dim currow, cardcnt as integer dim cards() as string GetLoyalty
currow = _LoyaltyStartRow cardcnt = 0 do until currow > _LoyaltyStartRow + _MaxLoyaltyInHand if InStr(LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(PlayerLoyaltyCol(playerID), currow).string, "You Are a Cylon") > 0 then cardcnt = cardcnt +1 redim preserve cards(cardcnt) as string cards(cardcnt) = LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(PlayerLoyaltyCol(playerID), currow).string end if currow = currow +1 loop GetCylonCards = cards() end function 'GetCylonCards
function IsMutineer (playerID as integer) as boolean dim currow, col, cardcnt as integer GetLoyalty
IsMutineer = (GetMutineer = playerID) end function
sub SetMutineer (playerID as integer) GetLoyalty
LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutineerCol, _MutineerRow).value = playerID end sub
function GetMutineer as integer GetLoyalty
GetMutineer = LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(_MutineerCol, _MutineerRow).value end function
function DiscardLoyalty (playerID as integer, cardtxt as string) as boolean dim currow, col as integer GetLoyalty 'find the first instance of cardtxt and discard it by greying out the background 'if cardtxt = "*" then we are discarding the whole hand (execution)
DiscardLoyalty = FALSE ' return false if there are no cards to discard currow = _LoyaltyStartRow col = PlayerLoyaltyCol(playerID) do until currow > _LoyaltyStartRow + _MaxLoyaltyInHand if (ucase(LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(col, currow).string) = ucase(cardtxt) OR _ (cardtxt = "*" and LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(col, currow).string <> "" and LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(col, currow).string <> "You are a Mutineer")) AND _ LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(col, currow).CellBackColor = _white _ then LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(col, currow).CellBackColor = _grey LogThis GetPlayerName(playerID) & " showed/discarded '" & LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(col, currow).string & "'." DiscardLoyalty = TRUE exit do end if
currow = currow + 1 loop UpdateLoyaltyCount end function 'DiscardLoyalty
sub UpdateLoyaltyCount () dim currow, cardcnt, playerID as integer GetLoyalty ' we need to count how many cards are in the player's hand, which is designated by a white background at this point
for playerID = 1 to 7 cardcnt = 0 currow = _LoyaltyStartRow do until currow > _LoyaltyStartRow + _MaxLoyaltyInHand if LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(PlayerLoyaltyCol(playerID), currow).string <> "" and _ LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(PlayerLoyaltyCol(playerID), currow).string <> "You are a Mutineer" and _ LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(PlayerLoyaltyCol(playerID), currow).CellBackColor = _white then cardcnt=cardcnt + 1 end if currow = currow + 1 loop LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(PlayerLoyaltyCol(playerID), _LoyaltyCntRow).value = cardcnt next playerID end sub 'UpdateLoyaltyCount
function GetLoyaltyCount(playerID as integer) as integer GetLoyalty
GetLoyaltyCount = LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(PlayerLoyaltyCol(playerID), _LoyaltyCntRow).value end function
'+== should this stuff come from a reference tab? sub BuildLoyaltyDecks dim i, curLoyaltyCard, notCnt, cyloncardcnt, cylon1, cylon2 as integer dim cylonCards(1) as string dim notCylonCards(22) as string GetLoyalty GetRef
'clear the Loyalty Decks do until GetFromLoyaltyDeck(_DeckLoyalty) = "" loop do until GetFromLoyaltyDeck(_DeckNotACylon) = "" loop do until GetFromLoyaltyDeck(_DeckFlaws) = "" loop
cyloncardcnt = 0 curLoyaltyCard = 0
'first lets put our Cylon cards in the deck do while (RefSheet.getCellByPosition(_LoyaltyGameRefCol, _LoyaltyRefRow + curLoyaltyCard).string = "B") cyloncardcnt = cyloncardcnt + 1 redim preserve cylonCards(cyloncardcnt) as string cylonCards(cyloncardcnt) = RefSheet.getCellByPosition(_LoyaltyTextRefCol, _LoyaltyRefRow + curLoyaltyCard).string curLoyaltyCard = curLoyaltyCard + 1 loop
do while (RefSheet.getCellByPosition(_LoyaltyGameRefCol, _LoyaltyRefRow + curLoyaltyCard).string = "P") if GameTypeIsPegasus() then cyloncardcnt = cyloncardcnt + 1 redim preserve cylonCards(cyloncardcnt) as string cylonCards(cyloncardcnt) = RefSheet.getCellByPosition(_LoyaltyTextRefCol, _LoyaltyRefRow + curLoyaltyCard).string end if curLoyaltyCard = curLoyaltyCard + 1 loop
do while (RefSheet.getCellByPosition(_LoyaltyGameRefCol, _LoyaltyRefRow + curLoyaltyCard).string = "E") if GameTypeIsExodus() then cyloncardcnt = cyloncardcnt + 1 redim preserve cylonCards(cyloncardcnt) as string cylonCards(cyloncardcnt) = RefSheet.getCellByPosition(_LoyaltyTextRefCol, _LoyaltyRefRow + curLoyaltyCard).string end if curLoyaltyCard = curLoyaltyCard + 1 loop
do while (RefSheet.getCellByPosition(_LoyaltyGameRefCol, _LoyaltyRefRow + curLoyaltyCard).string = "R") if GameTypeIsRevelations() then cyloncardcnt = cyloncardcnt + 1 redim preserve cylonCards(cyloncardcnt) as string cylonCards(cyloncardcnt) = RefSheet.getCellByPosition(_LoyaltyTextRefCol, _LoyaltyRefRow + curLoyaltyCard).string end if curLoyaltyCard = curLoyaltyCard + 1 loop
do while (RefSheet.getCellByPosition(_LoyaltyGameRefCol, _LoyaltyRefRow + curLoyaltyCard).string = "C") if VariantCustomLoyalty() then cyloncardcnt = cyloncardcnt + 1 redim preserve cylonCards(cyloncardcnt) as string cylonCards(cyloncardcnt) = RefSheet.getCellByPosition(_LoyaltyTextRefCol, _LoyaltyRefRow + curLoyaltyCard).string end if curLoyaltyCard = curLoyaltyCard + 1 loop
cylon1 = Int(RND() * cyloncardcnt) do while CylonCards(cylon1) = "" cylon1 = Int(RND() * cyloncardcnt) + 1 loop
AddToLoyaltyDeck _DeckLoyalty, CylonCards(cylon1) if PlayerCnt() > 5 or (PlayerCnt() = 5 and Not HasLeader()) then cylon2 = Int(RND() * cyloncardcnt) + 1 do while cylon1 = cylon2 or CylonCards(cylon2) = "" cylon2 = Int(RND()* cyloncardcnt) + 1 loop AddToLoyaltyDeck _DeckLoyalty, CylonCards(cylon2) end if
if GameTypeIsExodus() then notCnt = 16 else notCnt = 12 end if 'now lets build our 'Not' deck for i = 1 to notCnt AddToLoyaltyDeck _DeckNotACylon, "You are NOT a Cylon" next i
curLoyaltyCard = curLoyaltyCard + _GoalsRefOffset 'increment by one to get past the PG Header do while (RefSheet.getCellByPosition(_LoyaltyGameRefCol, _LoyaltyRefRow + curLoyaltyCard).string = "E") if UsePersonalGoals then AddToLoyaltyDeck _DeckNotACylon, "Personal Goal - " & RefSheet.getCellByPosition(_LoyaltyTextRefCol, _LoyaltyRefRow + curLoyaltyCard).string end if curLoyaltyCard = curLoyaltyCard + 1 loop do while (RefSheet.getCellByPosition(_LoyaltyGameRefCol, _LoyaltyRefRow + curLoyaltyCard).string = "C") if UsePersonalGoals and VariantCustomLoyalty then AddToLoyaltyDeck _DeckNotACylon, "Personal Goal - " & RefSheet.getCellByPosition(_LoyaltyTextRefCol, _LoyaltyRefRow + curLoyaltyCard).string end if curLoyaltyCard = curLoyaltyCard + 1 loop
curLoyaltyCard = curLoyaltyCard + _FinalFiveRefOffset 'increment by one to get past the FF Header do while (RefSheet.getCellByPosition(_LoyaltyGameRefCol, _LoyaltyRefRow + curLoyaltyCard).string = "E") if UseFinalFive then AddToLoyaltyDeck _DeckNotACylon, "Final Five - " & RefSheet.getCellByPosition(_LoyaltyTextRefCol, _LoyaltyRefRow + curLoyaltyCard).string end if curLoyaltyCard = curLoyaltyCard + 1 loop do while (RefSheet.getCellByPosition(_LoyaltyGameRefCol, _LoyaltyRefRow + curLoyaltyCard).string = "C") if UseFinalFive and VariantCustomLoyalty then AddToLoyaltyDeck _DeckNotACylon, "Final Five - " & RefSheet.getCellByPosition(_LoyaltyTextRefCol, _LoyaltyRefRow + curLoyaltyCard).string end if curLoyaltyCard = curLoyaltyCard + 1 loop
' Flaws if VariantFlaws() then for curLoyaltyCard = 1 to _NumFlaws AddToLoyaltyDeck _DeckFlaws, RefSheet.getCellByPosition(_LoyaltyGameRefCol, _FlawRefRow + CurLoyaltyCard - 1).string AddToLoyaltyDeck _DeckFlaws, RefSheet.getCellByPosition(_LoyaltyGameRefCol, _FlawRefRow + CurLoyaltyCard - 1).string ' Two copies of each. next curLoyaltyCard ShuffleLoyaltyDeck _DeckFlaws end if
ShuffleLoyaltyDeck _DeckNotACylon
'now deal non-a-cylon cards into the loyalty deck ' Two Loyalty Cards per player. notCnt = PlayerCnt() * 2
' Except the Cylon Leader. if HasLeader() then notCnt = notCnt - 2 end if
' Replace a YANAC with a YAAC for each Cylon in the game. if PlayerCnt() <= 4 or (PlayerCnt() = 5 and HasLeader()) then notCnt = notCnt -1 else notCnt = notCnt -2 end if
' If there's a Sympathizer, replace another card. if (OptionIsSympathizer() or OptionIsSympatheticCylon()) then notCnt = notCnt - 1 end if
if GetPlayerID("Baltar") > 0 then notCnt = notCnt + 1 end if if GetPlayerID("Boomer") > 0 then notCnt = notCnt + 1 end if if GameTypeIsExodus() then notCnt = notCnt + 1 end if for i = 1 to notCnt AddToLoyaltyDeck _DeckLoyalty, GetFromLoyaltyDeck(_DeckNotACylon) next i if OptionIsMutineer() then AddToLoyaltyDeck _DeckLoyalty, "You are a Mutineer" end if
ShuffleLoyaltyDeck _DeckLoyalty end sub 'BuildLoyaltyDecks
sub AddSympathizerCard if OptionIsSympatheticCylon() then AddToLoyaltyDeck _DeckLoyalty, "You are a Sympathetic Cylon" else 'standard sympathizer AddToLoyaltyDeck _DeckLoyalty, "You are a Sympathizer" end if ShuffleLoyaltyDeck _DeckLoyalty end sub 'AddSympathizerCard
sub DealMotives (playerID as integer) dim motive, motiveCnt, dealt as integer dim curMotive, motivesDeck(_NumMotives) as string
motivesDeck = Array("End the Chase", "Make an Ally", "Remove the Threat", "Improve Efficiency", "Learn to Cherish", "Pressure Their Leaders", "Keep them Docile", _ "A Justified Response", "No Unnecessary Force", "Savor their Demise", "Fight with Honor", "Subjects for Study", "A False Sense of Security", "Harvest their Resources")
for motiveCnt = 1 to _NumMotivesDealt ' Grab a Motive do motive = Int(Rnd() * _NumMotives) curMotive = motivesDeck(motive) loop until curMotive <> ""
' Remove from the deck motivesDeck(motive) = ""
' Rename motive if motive < 7 then curMotive = "Human Allegiance: " & curMotive else curMotive = "Cylon Allegiance: " & curMotive end if
' Deal Motive LoyaltyToPlayer(playerID, curMotive, _LoyaltyStart) next motiveCnt end sub
sub Initialize_Loyalty dim playerID, i, topofdeck as integer dim loyaltydeck, button as variant GetLoyalty GetSF
'clear any previous loyalty and blank the fields SetCurrentTask("Clearing Up Old Loyalty Fields") for playerID = 1 to 7 ' Reset all the rows to blue. for i = 0 to _MaxLoyaltyInHand LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(PlayerLoyaltyCol(playerID), _LoyaltyAgendaRow + i).string = "" LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(PlayerLoyaltyCol(playerID), _LoyaltyAgendaRow + i).CellBackColor = _bluegrey next i
' Make the starting Loyalty white. if playerID <= PlayerCnt() and not IsCylonLeader(playerID) then LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(PlayerLoyaltyCol(playerID), _LoyaltyStartRow).CellBackColor = _white LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(PlayerLoyaltyCol(playerID), _LoyaltySleeperRow).CellBackColor = _white end if
' Mark Boomer's second Sleeper Loyalty section white, because then the Mod knows there's a slot open? if GetPlayerName(playerID) = "Boomer" then LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(PlayerLoyaltyCol(playerID), _LoyaltySleeperRow + 1).CellBackColor = _white end if next playerID
SetMutineer(0)
SetCurrentTask("Building Loyalty Decks") BuildLoyaltyDecks
SetCurrentTask("Dealing Initial Loyalty, Agenda and Motives") for playerID = 1 to PlayerCnt() SetLoyaltyHuman playerID if IsCylonLeader(playerID) then if GameTypeIsDaybreak() then ' We're going to deal all four Motives now, because nothing interferes with the Motive deck. DealMotives(playerID) SetRevealed playerID else LoyaltyToPlayer playerID, Deal_Agenda(), _LoyaltyAgenda SetRevealed playerID SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(GetSkillSetCol(_SkillSetHand, playerID), _SkillFlawRow).CharColor = _purple end if else if VariantFlaws() then LoyaltyToPlayer playerID, GetFromLoyaltyDeck(_DeckFlaws), _LoyaltyFlaw SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(GetSkillSetCol(_SkillSetHand, playerID), _SkillFlawRow).CharColor = _blue2 end if if not VariantManualLoyalty then LoyaltyToPlayer playerID, GetFromLoyaltyDeck(_DeckLoyalty), _LoyaltyStart
if GetPlayerName(playerID) = "Baltar" then LoyaltyToPlayer playerID, GetFromLoyaltyDeck(_DeckLoyalty), _LoyaltyStart end if end if end if next playerID
' display the loyalty/Sleeper deck. if OptionIsSympathizer() or OptionIsSympatheticCylon() then SetCurrentTask("Adding Sympathizer Card") AddSympathizerCard end if
if Not GameTypeIsExodus() then do until GetFromLoyaltyDeck(_DeckNotACylon) = "" loop end if
' if VariantFlaws() then ' do until GetFromLoyaltyDeck(_DeckFlaws) = "" ' loop ' end if
' button = LoyaltyForm.getByName("btnPersonalGoal")
SetCurrentTask("Enabling Buttons and Populating Form") LoyaltyForm.getByName("btnPersonalGoal").EnableVisible = UsePersonalGoals or (GameTypeIsDaybreak() and HasLeader) LoyaltyForm.getByName("lstPersonalGoal").EnableVisible = UsePersonalGoals or (GameTypeIsDaybreak() and HasLeader)
LoyaltyForm.getByName("btnDealLoyalty").EnableVisible = VariantManualLoyalty LoyaltyForm.getByName("btnDealLoyalty").enabled = VariantManualLoyalty
LoyaltyForm.getByName("btnRevealFlaw").EnableVisible = VariantFlaws LoyaltyForm.getByName("btnRevealFlaw").enabled = VariantFlaws
LoyaltyForm.getByName("btnOddBehavior").EnableVisible = FALSE LoyaltyForm.getByName("btnOddBehavior").enabled = FALSE
PopulateGiveLoyaltyFrom end sub 'Initialize_Loyalty
' Pulls the top card of the deck and returns it...compresses the remainder function GetFromLoyaltyDeck (whichdeck as integer) as string dim currow, deckcol as integer GetLoyalty
if whichdeck = _DeckLoyalty then deckcol = _LoyaltyDeckCol elseif whichdeck = _DeckNotACylon then deckcol = _LoyaltyDeckCol + 1 else deckCol = _LoyaltyDeckCol + 2 end if
if LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(deckcol, _LoyaltyDeckRow).string = "" then GetFromLoyaltyDeck = "" exit function end if
GetFromLoyaltyDeck = LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(deckcol, _LoyaltyDeckRow).string LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(deckcol, _LoyaltyDeckRow).string = ""
currow = _LoyaltyDeckRow do until LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(deckcol, currow + 1).string = "" LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(deckcol, currow).string = LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(deckcol, currow + 1).string LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(deckcol, currow).CharColor = LoyaltyCardColor(LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(deckcol, currow).string) currow = currow + 1 loop LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(deckcol, currow).string = "" end function 'GetFromLoyaltyDeck
' Adds a card to the bottom of the Loyalty Deck sub AddToLoyaltyDeck (whichdeck as integer, cardtxt as string) dim currow, deckcol as integer GetLoyalty
if whichdeck = _DeckLoyalty then deckcol = _LoyaltyDeckCol elseif whichdeck = _DeckNotACylon then deckcol = _LoyaltyDeckCol + 1 else deckCol = _LoyaltyDeckCol + 2 end if
currow = _LoyaltyDeckRow do while LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(deckcol, currow).string <> "" currow=currow+1 loop LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(deckcol, currow).string = cardtxt LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(deckcol, currow).CharColor = LoyaltyCardColor(cardtxt) end sub 'AddToLoyaltyDeck
' Puts a Loyalty card in a player's hand ' if it makes them a cylon, set their loyalty appropriately sub LoyaltyToPlayer (playerID as integer, loyaltycard as string, optional blockID as integer) dim currow, curcol as integer GetLoyalty
if IsMissing(blockID) then blockID = _LoyaltyOther end if curcol = PlayerLoyaltyCol(playerID) select case blockID case _LoyaltyStart currow = _LoyaltyStartRow case _LoyaltySleeper currow = _LoyaltySleeperRow case _LoyaltyOther currow = _LoyaltyOtherRow case _LoyaltyAgenda currow = _LoyaltyAgendaRow case _LoyaltyFlaw currow = _LoyaltyFlawRow end select
do until LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(curcol, currow).string = "" currow = currow + 1 loop LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(curcol, currow).string = loyaltycard LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(curcol, currow).CellBackColor = _white if blockID = _LoyaltyFlaw then LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(curcol, currow).CharColor = _blue2 else LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(curcol, currow).CharColor = LoyaltyCardColor(loyaltycard) end if if InStr(loyaltycard, "You Are a Cylon") > 0 or IsCylonLeader(playerID) then SetLoyaltyCylon playerID elseif InStr(loyaltycard, "Mutineer") > 0 and not IsRevealed(playerID) then MsgBox GetPlayerName(playerID) & " is the Mutineer!" if GetMutineer() = 0 then MsgBox GetPlayerName(playerID) & " receives another Loyalty Card as the Mutineer." LoyaltyToPlayer playerID, GetFromLoyaltyDeck(_DeckLoyalty), _LoyaltyOther end if MakeMutineer playerID elseif InStr(loyaltycard, "Sympa") > 0 and not IsRevealed(playerID) then MakeSympathetic playerID end if
PopulateGiveLoyaltyFrom UpdateLoyaltyCount end sub 'LoyaltyToPlayer
sub ShuffleLoyaltyDeck (whichdeck as integer) dim tmpval, sortOrder() as double dim i,j,cardcnt, currow as integer dim tmpcard, loyaltycard() as string GetLoyalty
cardcnt=0 tmpcard = GetFromLoyaltyDeck(whichdeck) do until tmpcard = "" cardcnt = cardcnt + 1 redim preserve loyaltycard(cardcnt) as string loyaltycard(cardcnt) = tmpcard tmpcard = GetFromLoyaltyDeck(whichdeck) loop
redim sortOrder(cardcnt)
for i = 1 to cardcnt sortOrder(i) = rnd() next i
for i = 1 to cardcnt -1 for j = i + 1 to cardcnt if SortOrder(i) > sortOrder(j) then tmpval = sortOrder(i) tmpcard = loyaltycard(i)
SortOrder(i) = sortOrder(j) loyaltycard(i) = loyaltycard(j)
sortorder(j) = tmpval loyaltycard(j) = tmpcard end if next j next i
for i= 1 to cardcnt AddToLoyaltyDeck whichdeck, loyaltycard(i) next i end sub 'ShuffleLoyaltyDeck
sub DealSleeperCards ' just need to deal the sleeper cards based on the current player (who gets the first card) ' and set the loyalty of anyone who became a Cylon (including symp?) dim curID, i, rtncd as integer dim sympID as integer dim curcard, tmpmsg as string
GetLoyalty
sympID = 0 curID = GetCurrentPlayer() for i = 1 to PlayerCnt() if Not IsCylonLeader(curID) then if not VariantManualLoyalty then curcard = GetFromLoyaltyDeck(_DeckLoyalty) LoyaltyToPlayer curID, curcard, _LoyaltySleeper end if
if GetPlayerName(curID) = "Boomer" then if not VariantManualLoyalty then if not (GameTypeIsExodus and IsRevealed(curID)) then curcard = GetFromLoyaltyDeck(_DeckLoyalty) LoyaltyToPlayer curID, curcard, _LoyaltySleeper end if end if
' if Boomer is not a revealed Cylon, she should be sent to the brig if Not IsRevealed(curID) then SetPlayerLoc curID, "Brig" MsgBox "Boomer has been sent to the brig" LogThis "Boomer moved to the brig" end if end if end if curID = CurID + 1 if curID > PlayerCnt() then curID = 1 end if next i
' Manage the Sympahtizer now if sympID > 0 then MakeSympathetic sympID end if
tmpmsg = "" for i = 1 to PlayerCnt() if IsRevealed(i) and not IsCylonLeader(i) then if tmpmsg = "" then tmpmsg = GetPlayerName(i) else tmpmsg = tmpmsg & " and " & GetPlayerName(i) end if end if next i if tmpmsg <> "" then MsgBox "Don't forget to hand off extra Loyalty cards from " & tmpmsg end if end sub
sub MakeSympathetic (playerID as integer) if OptionIsSympatheticCylon() then 'Pegasus: we have a Sympathetic Cylon MsgBox GetPlayerName(playerID) & " is a Sympathetic Cylon." '"Reveal" the Cylon and mark as a sympathizer MakeCylon playerID, FALSE ' Deal an Agenda to the Sympathetic Cylon LoyaltyToPlayer playerID, Deal_Agenda(), _LoyaltyAgenda
DiscardLoyalty playerID, "You Are a Sympathetic Cylon" else 'Base game: we have a Sympathizer (could be human or cylon) ' if we have a Sympathizer who is not a revealed Cylon and everything is blue then the Symp Reveals and goes to the Rez ship if ResourcesAreBlue() and not IsRevealed(playerID) then MsgBox GetPlayerName(playerID) & " is the Cylon Sympathizer. All resources are Blue, so " & GetPlayerName(playerID) & " reveals as a Cylon."
SetLoyaltySympathetic playerID MakeCylon playerID, FALSE
elseif IsRevealed (playerID) then MsgBox GetPlayerName(playerID) & " got the Sympathizer card. As a revealed Cylon, " & GetPlayerName(playerID) & " gets to give it to someone else. You need to manage that by hand."
else ' we have a symp who is not revealed and at least one resource is red, so throw the fool into the brig MsgBox GetPlayerName(playerID) & " is the Sympathizer and is being sent to the brig." SetPlayerLoc playerID, "Brig" end if DiscardLoyalty playerID, "You Are a Sympathizer" end if end sub 'MakeSympathetic
sub MakeMutineer (playerID as integer) dim zarekID as integer SetMutineer(playerID) if GetTitle(_TitlePresident) = playerID then UpdateTitle GetNextTitle(_TitlePresident, playerID), _TitlePresident MsgBox GetPlayerName(GetTitle(_TitlePresident)) & " is now the President." LogThis GetPlayerName(GetTitle(_TitlePresident)) & " is now the President." end if if GetTitle(_TitleAdmiral) = playerID then UpdateTitle GetNextTitle(_TitleAdmiral, playerID), _TitleAdmiral MsgBox GetPlayerName(GetTitle(_TitleAdmiral)) & " is now the Admiral." LogThis GetPlayerName(GetTitle(_TitleAdmiral)) & " is now the Admiral." end if if UseCylonFleet and GetTitle(_TitleCAG) = playerID then UpdateTitle GetNextTitle(_TitleCAG, playerID), _TitleCAG MsgBox GetPlayerName(GetTitle(_TitleCAG)) & " is now the CAG." LogThis GetPlayerName(GetTitle(_TitleCAG)) & " is now the CAG." end if
for zarekID = 1 to PlayerCnt() if GetPlayerName(zarekID) = "Tom" then MsgBox GetPlayerName(playerID) & " draws two Mutiny cards, have Zarek bury one." DrawMutiny(playerID, false) DrawMutiny(playerID, false) exit sub end if next zarekID MsgBox GetPlayerName(playerID) & " draws a Mutiny Card." DrawMutiny(playerID) end sub
sub GiveLoyaltyCard dim fromStr, toStr, curcard, tmplst() as string dim fromID, toID, currow, rtn as integer dim mutineer as boolean GetLoyalty
fromID = SelectedLoyaltyPlayerID() if fromID = 0 then MsgBox "Please select a player to give the card(s).",0,"Give Loyalty Cards" exit sub end if fromStr = GetPlayerName(fromID)
tmplst = LoyaltyForm.getByName("lstLoyaltyTo").SelectedItems() if ubound(tmplst) = -1 then MsgBox "Please select a player to receive the card(s).",0,"Give Loyalty Cards" exit sub end if toStr = LoyaltyForm.getByName("lstLoyaltyTo").StringItemList(val(tmplst(0)) toID = GetPlayerID(toStr) mutineer = false
if IsMutineer(fromID) then if msgBox (fromStr & " makes " & toStr & " the Mutineer?", 4, "Give Loyalty Cards") = 6 then mutineer = true end if end if if not mutineer then if MsgBox (fromStr & " gives all unplayed Loyalty cards to " & toStr & "?",4,"Give Loyalty Cards") <> 6 then exit sub elseif GetTotalDistance > 6 then if MsgBox ("Distance is greater than 6, pass Loyalty cards anyway?",4,"Give Loyalty Cards") <> 6 then exit sub end if end if end if
'any card that has a white background is in the player's hand...move it. currow = _LoyaltyStartRow do until currow > _LoyaltyStartRow + _MaxLoyaltyInHand if LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(PlayerLoyaltyCol(fromID), currow).string <> "" AND _ LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(PlayerLoyaltyCol(fromID), currow).CellBackColor = _white AND _ (((not mutineer) xor LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(PlayerLoyaltyCol(fromID), currow).string = "You are a Mutineer") or (IsRevealed(fromID))) _ then curcard = LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(PlayerLoyaltyCol(fromID), currow).string LoyaltyToPlayer toID, curcard, _LoyaltyOther LogThis fromStr & " gives Loyalty card '" & curcard & "' to " & toStr 'If we just handed off a Cylon card, change the player's loyalty if InStr(curcard,"Symp") > 0 then MakeSympathetic toID end if LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(PlayerLoyaltyCol(fromID), currow).string = "" LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(PlayerLoyaltyCol(fromID), currow).CellBackColor = _bluegrey end if currow = currow + 1 loop PopulateGiveLoyaltyFrom UpdateLoyaltyCount end sub 'GiveLoyaltyCard
sub DealLoyaltyCard dim toStr, curcard as string dim toID, currow as integer GetLoyalty

LoyaltyToPlayer GetPlayerID(toStr), GetFromLoyaltyDeck(_DeckLoyalty), _LoyaltyOther
PopulateGiveLoyaltyFrom UpdateLoyaltyCount end sub 'DealLoyaltyCard
sub btnRevealFlaw RevealFlaw() end sub
sub RevealFlaw (optional playerid as variant, optional force as variant) GetLoyalty GetSF dim rtn as integer
if IsMissing(playerID) then playerID = SelectedLoyaltyPlayerID() if playerID = 0 then MsgBox "Please select a player to Reveal their Flaw.",0,"Reveal Flaw" exit sub end if end if
LogThis GetPlayerName(playerID) & " Reveals " & LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(PlayerLoyaltyCol(playerID), _LoyaltyFlawRow).string & "." if (not IsMissing(force)) and force then MsgBox GetPlayerName(playerID) & " is forced to Reveal " & LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(PlayerLoyaltyCol(playerID), _LoyaltyFlawRow).string & "." rtn = 7 elseif GetTotalDistance() < 6 then MsgBox GetPlayerName(playerID) & " Reveals " & LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(PlayerLoyaltyCol(playerID), _LoyaltyFlawRow).string & "." rtn = 7 else rtn = MsgBox("Does " & GetPlayerName(playerID) & " Reveal " & LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(PlayerLoyaltyCol(playerID), _LoyaltyFlawRow).string & " willingly?", 3, "Reveal Flaw") end if
if rtn = 6 then DiscardFlaw(playerID) elseif rtn = 7 then SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(GetSkillSetCol(_SkillSetHand, playerID), _SkillFlawRow).CellBackColor = _red LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(PlayerLoyaltyCol(playerID), _LoyaltyFlawRow).CharColor = _red end if
PopulateGiveLoyaltyFrom end sub
function FlawRevealed (playerID as integer) as boolean FlawRevealed = (LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(PlayerLoyaltyCol(playerID), _LoyaltyFlawRow).CharColor = _red) end function
sub DiscardFlaw (playerID as integer) GetLoyalty GetSF
MsgBox GetPlayerName(playerID) & " discards " & LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(PlayerLoyaltyCol(playerID), _LoyaltyFlawRow).string & "." LogThis GetPlayerName(playerID) & " discards " & LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(PlayerLoyaltyCol(playerID), _LoyaltyFlawRow).string & "." SkillSheet.getCellByPosition(GetSkillSetCol(_SkillSetHand, playerID), _SkillFlawRow).CellBackColor = _white LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(PlayerLoyaltyCol(playerID), _LoyaltyFlawRow).string = "" LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(PlayerLoyaltyCol(playerID), _LoyaltyFlawRow).CharColor = _white
PopulateGiveLoyaltyFrom end sub
sub PopulateGiveLoyaltyFrom dim playerID, currow, cntr as integer dim playerlst(1) as string dim addme as boolean GetLoyalty
cntr = 1 for playerID = 1 to PlayerCnt() ' Cylon Leaders never have Loyalty or Flaws if IsCylonLeader(playerID) then addme = GameTypeIsDaybreak() elseif VariantManualLoyalty() then ' Everyone but a Cylon Leader is added (I suppose once the deck is empty that's not true) addme = true else ' Add anyone who has a flaw or any remaining Loyalty Cards. if VariantFlaws() then addme = LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(PlayerLoyaltyCol(playerID), _LoyaltyFlawRow).string <> "" and not FlawRevealed(playerID) end if
' see if this player has any cards that can be given away... currow = _LoyaltyStartRow do until currow > _LoyaltyStartRow + _MaxLoyaltyInHand if LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(PlayerLoyaltyCol(playerID), currow).string <> "" AND _ LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(PlayerLoyaltyCol(playerID), currow).CellBackColor = _white _ then addme = true exit do end if currow = currow + 1 loop end if
' If we should add them, do so. if addme then redim preserve playerlst(cntr) as string playerlst(cntr) = GetPlayerName(playerID) cntr=cntr+1 end if next playerID ' end if
LoyaltyForm.getByName("lstLoyaltyFrom").StringItemList=playerlst() UpdateLoyaltyOptions end sub 'PopulateGiveLoyaltyFrom
sub PopulatePersonalGoals dim currow, pgcnt as integer dim tmplst() as string dim goalstr as string dim playerID as integer
playerID = SelectedLoyaltyPlayerID()
currow = _LoyaltyStartRow pgcnt = 0 do until currow > _LoyaltyStartRow + _MaxLoyaltyInHand goalstr = LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(PlayerLoyaltyCol(playerID), currow).string if (Instr(goalstr, "Goal") > 0 OR InStr(goalstr, "Chase") > 0 OR InStr(goalStr, "Ally") > 0 OR InStr(goalStr, "Justified") OR InStr(goalStr, "Force")) AND _ LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(PlayerLoyaltyCol(playerID), currow).CellBackColor = _white _ then pgcnt = pgcnt + 1 redim preserve tmplst(pgcnt) as string tmplst(pgcnt) = LoyaltySheet.getCellByPosition(PlayerLoyaltyCol(playerID), currow).string end if currow = currow + 1 loop
LoyaltyForm.getByName("lstPersonalGoal").StringItemList = tmplst() end sub 'PopulatePersonalGoals
